system.weapons:
Pilot: (Front, Range 600m (6 AU), S/-/-, 2d10+10 E, Pen 30, Clip -, Reload -, Accurate)

Pilot: (Front, Range 400m (4 AU), S/-/4, 3d10+10 E, Pen 10, Clip -, Reload -, Accurate)
system.specialRules: Is a Spacecraft, can act as Flyer or Skimmer in Atmosphere, following relevent rules and work in and out of atmosphere. All Pilot Weapons can be fired as one shooting weapons, at targets no more than 1 AU Apart, Roll for Hits and Damage Seperately. When increasing the distance of a turn, pilot test is always +0, can turn after moving 3 AU's rather than 4. All shooting at vehicle has -20. When receiving Critical Hits not as a result of Righteous Fury, halve result, rounding up. No Penalty if squadron is below Half-Strength. Has Craft Rating of +15 and squadron size of 12 for Attack Craft Purposes.
